title: Error 004
body: While I am downloading game it reach 60%-70% then error 004 come. I tryed reinstal game trough hextech repair tool and nothing happened.Can someone help me?

replies.body: This 004 error is the updated client's way of saying there's a connection issue while reaching the patching servers.  Your network may be unstable and failing to properly grab updates from there.  Run through the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot and strengthen your connection to the patching server.  Let me know if you have any questions!
Tryed everything from that site but nothing changed. That error started showing up when new cliend relased and I tryed to patch by old client but error shows too.

Damn, sorry to hear the issue is still on-going.  In that case, download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to grab some logs, and attach it to a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Our tech team will help you out!
